Package oh_hecc.game_parts.passage

Interface PassageEditingInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Heccable, ModelBitsPassageInterface, Parseable, PassageModelEditablePassageInterface, SharedPassage, UpdatableLinkedUUIDsInterface
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditablePassage
public interface PassageEditingInterface extends SharedPassage, UpdatableLinkedUUIDsInterface, ModelBitsPassageInterface, PassageModelEditablePassageInterface
An interface for the passages, intended for use with editing them.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • makePassageTagListFromString

      static ArrayList<String> makePassageTagListFromString​(String tagListString) throws InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
      Called to update the tag list via the OH-HECC editor
      Parameters:
      tagListString - the string list of tags which are to be given to this (space delimited)
      Returns:
      a String ArrayList formed from the string tag list. Empty arrayList will be returned if empty string provided as input.
      Throws:
      InvalidMetadataDeclarationException - if the string tag list was invalid

    • getPassageContentWithRenamedLinks

      static String getPassageContentWithRenamedLinks​(String rawContent, String oldPassageName, String renameTo)
      This will update the given rawContent such that all links with the old passage name will be updated to link to the new passage name
      Parameters:
      rawContent - the raw passage content that needs updating
      oldPassageName - the old passage name which is being looked for
      renameTo - the renamed passage that the links must be redirected to
      Returns:
      the rawContent but with the appropriate passage links renamed

    • setPassageContent

      void setPassageContent​(String newContent)
      This method will be used when the passage content needs to be updated indirectly. Replaces the passageContent, and updates the linkedPassages appropriately
      Parameters:
      newContent - the new content that the passage now holds

    • updatePassageContent

      Map<UUID,​PassageEditingInterface> updatePassageContent​(String newContent, Map<UUID,​PassageEditingInterface> allPassages)
      This method will be used when the passage content needs to be updated directly. Replaces the passageContent, and updates the linkedPassages and map of all passages accordingly
      Parameters:
      newContent - the new content that the passage now holds
      allPassages - the map of all passages (just in case any new passages need to be added to the map)
      Returns:
      the updated map of all passages

    • resolvePassageLinks

      Map<UUID,​PassageEditingInterface> resolvePassageLinks​(Map<UUID,​PassageEditingInterface> allPassages)
      Basically handles adding passages to the list of all passages if this passage's content has links to passages which don't actually exist
      Parameters:
      allPassages - the map of all passages
      Returns:
      the map of all passages, updated if necessary (for any links to undeclared passages)

    • renameThisPassage

      Map<UUID,​PassageEditingInterface> renameThisPassage​(String newName, Map<UUID,​PassageEditingInterface> allPassages) throws InvalidPassageNameException, DuplicatePassageNameException
      This method will be used when attempting to rename this passage.
      Parameters:
      newName - the new name that the user is trying to give this passage.
      allPassages - the map of all passages. Any passages with links to this passage will have their links updated to point to the new name of this passage, assuming that this passage is successfully renamed.
      Returns:
      the updated copy of allPassages
      Throws:
      InvalidPassageNameException - if the passage name isn't a valid passage name
      DuplicatePassageNameException - if there's already a passage with this name which exists

    • deleteThisPassage

      Map<UUID,​PassageEditingInterface> deleteThisPassage​(Map<UUID,​PassageEditingInterface> allPassages)
      This method is responsible for deleting this passage (and removing it from the map of all passages)
      Parameters:
      allPassages - The map of all passages
      Returns:
      a version of the map of all passages with this passage completely removed

    • removeLinkedPassage

      boolean removeLinkedPassage​(String removeThisPassageName, UUID removeThisPassageUUID)
      Method that can be used to remove a passage from another passage's linked passages
      Parameters:
      removeThisPassageName - the passage to remove
      removeThisPassageUUID - the UUID of the passage to remove
      Returns:
      true if it got yote

    • updateLinkedUUIDs

      void updateLinkedUUIDs​(Collection<? extends SharedPassage> allPassages)
      Method that'll be used to update the set containing the UUIDs of all the passages that this passage is linked to. call this for each element in the map of (? extends SharedPassages) after everything's been added to it.
      Specified by:
      updateLinkedUUIDs in interface UpdatableLinkedUUIDsInterface
      Parameters:
      allPassages - the collection of all passages mapped to UUIDs (where the UUIDs will be read from basically)

    • getPassageTagsAsString

      String getPassageTagsAsString()
      Obtains the list of passage tags as a string, seperated by spaces, but without the opening/closing []
      Returns:
      the string version of the passage tags (divided by spaces, no opening/closing [])

    • updatePassageTags

      boolean updatePassageTags​(String newPassageTagListString) throws InvalidMetadataDeclarationException
      Updates the passage tag list, from a string passage tag list (word characters only, space delimited)
      Parameters:
      newPassageTagListString - the space-delimited new passage tag list string that will be used to update the passageTags of this passage
      Returns:
      true if this is carried out successfully
      Throws:
      InvalidMetadataDeclarationException - if the given passage tag list was invalid

    • removePassageTag

      boolean removePassageTag​(String tagToRemove)
      Removes a specified tag from the passageTags
      Parameters:
      tagToRemove - the tag that needs to be removed
      Returns:
      whether or not it was successful

    • addPassageTag

      boolean addPassageTag​(String tagToAdd)
      Add a new specified tag to the passageTags
      Parameters:
      tagToAdd - the tag to add
      Returns:
      whether or not it was successfullly added

      Specified by:
      updatePosition in interface ModelBitsPassageInterface
      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      void setTrailingComment​(String newComment)
      updates the trailing passage comment
      Parameters:
      newComment - the new trailing comment for the passage

    • isThisAPointOfNoReturn

      boolean isThisAPointOfNoReturn()
      Is this passage a 'point of no return'? (it's a point of no return if it has a 'noreturn' tag)
      Specified by:
      isThisAPointOfNoReturn in interface ModelBitsPassageInterface
      Returns:
      true if yes, false if not.

    • isThisValid

      boolean isThisValid()
      Work out whether or not this passage is valid, via the 'isValid()' method of this passage's PassageStatus enum.
      Returns:
      true if this passage is valid, false if not.
